Scammer Jack Hennessy who stole $337k from pensioners says he was blackmailed himself after losing $200k luxury Swiss watch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scammer-jack-hennessy-who-stole-337k-from-pensioners-says-he-was-blackmailed-himself-after-losing-200k-luxury-swiss-手表/PX7XQK6BFJGNVG6B7QD2U64FJM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/scammer-jack-hennessy-who-stole-337k-from-pensioners-says-he-was-blackmailed-himself-after-losing-200k-luxury-swiss-手表/PX7XQK6BFJGNVG6B7QD2U64FJM/ Lane NicholsThe scammer says UK criminals threatened his family and made him take flight to NZ Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Jack Hennessy, 26, is sentenced in Auckland District Court on charges of obtaining by deception. He claims he was blackmailed into taking part in the scam by a London crime syndicate after losing a loaned $200,000 Richard Mille watch. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
Violent brawl between groups outside Auckland hospital shared online, police investigating https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/violent-brawl- Between-groups-outside-auckland-hospital-shared-online-police-investigating/76EFOYKDLVDYNPEAZLJXSLJWCQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/violent-brawl- Between-groups-outside-auckland-hospital-shared-online-police-investigating/76EFOYKDLVDYNPEAZLJXSLJWCQ/ SUV reversed at speed, bat flung and metal pole used as spear during dispute. Fri, 15 Nov 2024 07:01:36 +0000 Police are making enquiries into the fight outside neighbouring Starship Children’s and Auckland City Hospitals, which was captured on two videos shared to TikTok. Photo / via video
Customs shares list of ‘strange, sophisticated’ new ways drugs are being smuggled into New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/customs-shares-list-of-strange-sophisticated-new-ways-drugs-are-being-smuggled-into-new-zealand/7APIB6B7CBCA5JG6QJZONE3L7I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/customs-shares-list-of-strange-sophisticated-new-ways-drugs-are-being-smuggled-into-new-zealand/7APIB6B7CBCA5JG6QJZONE3L7I/ Jaime LythCustoms say concealment methods by drug traffickers are increasing in sophistication. Fri, 15 Nov 2024 17:31:49 +0000 Items used to conceal drugs at the border include a diamante-encrusted horse head (cocaine), children's toys (MDMA), hair products (cocaine), lollies (methamphetamine) - and a methamphetamine crystal seized by authorities. Composite photo / NZ Customs and Police

Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Choosing a KiwiSaver fund is not like buying a car. Paying more in fees doesn't guarantee a better return, says Mary Holm.

Air New Zealand aborts Queenstown flights on eve of Queenstown Marathon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-aborts-queenstown-flights-on-eve-of-queenstown-marathon/ME7FZLJGG5CMRA4D7RNQ7OK2UM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-aborts-queenstown-flights-on-eve-of-queenstown-marathon/ME7FZLJGG5CMRA4D7RNQ7OK2UM/ Nazahryth BernardThe flights were carrying hundreds of athletes ahead of Saturday morning’s race.
